result.arabic_text: وَزَكَرِيَّآ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ رَبِّ لَا تَذَرۡنِي فَرۡدٗا وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثِينَ
result.translation: Kandi (unibuke) Zakariya, ubwo yatakambiraga Nyagasani we agira ati “Nyagasani wanjye! Ntundeke (ngo nkomeze kubaho) ndi njyenyine (nta rubyaro), kandi ari wowe muzungura mwiza.”
